paper_abstract: We prove uniqueness of the minimal enclosing ellipsoid with respect to strictly eigenvalue convex size functions. Special examples include the classic case of minimal volume ellipsoids (Lowner ellipsoids), minimal surface area ellipsoids or, more generally, ellipsoids that are minimal with respect to quermass integrals. paper_title: Uniqueness results for minimal enclosing ellipsoids
